update.name: JEM Package
update.changes: JEM 2.3.6 released on May 11 2023. First JEM version offering PHP8 compatibility. Please refer to the change log for details.; If you use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected. So please check the changes and adapt your files.; Versions previous to 2.3.2 will not install correctly on Joomla 3.10.1!; This version of JEM is not yet compatible with Joomla!4. You will have to upgrade to JEM 4.x for that!

update.name: JEM Package
update.changes: JEM 4.1.0 released on September 30 2023. Update release of JEM 4.0.0 offering essential bugfixes and some added functionality. Please refer to the change log for details.; If you use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected.; So please check the changes and adapt your files. Versions previous to 2.3.2 will not install correctly on Joomla 3.10.1!; For migration from JEM on Joomla 3.10.11, don't uninstall, only disable plugin and modules. Versions previous to 2.3.5 will not migrate correctly'; This version of JEM is the first JEM release that is compatible with Joomla! 4 and 5.
